body_html:
Last time I have seen this was when the -gencode was not correct for the requested cuda compute
ability. A gtx 760 has cuda compute ability 3.0 but the default build enables only 3.5 and 5.1.
Tensorflow should refuse to use this card unless CMakefile was changed and 3.0 was added to TF_EXTRA_CUDA_CAPABILITIES without adding 3.0 to -gencode.
OR there is some bug in that area.
I can take a look.

body:
Last time I have seen this was when the -gencode was not correct for the requested cuda compute
ability. A gtx 760 has cuda compute ability 3.0 but the default build enables only 3.5 and 5.1. 
Tensorflow should refuse to use this card unless CMakefile was changed and 3.0 was added to TF_EXTRA_CUDA_CAPABILITIES without adding 3.0 to -gencode.
OR there is some bug in that area.
I can take a look.
